47:         end
sample_unit=(value)

REQUIRED summary: The unit that the value is stored in. remarks: Each sample contains a value. All samples in a sample set should be stored using the same units. This value is a text description of the units the sample value is stored in. Use the "sample-unit-code" to describe the units as a dictionary code. value is a String

[Source]

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/thing/types/sample_set.rb, line 40
40:         def sample_unit=(value)
41:           @children['sample-unit'][:value] = value
42:         end

65:         end
sample_unit_code=(value)

REQUIRED summary: The dictionary code for the unit that the value is stored in. remarks: Each sample contains a value. All samples in a sample set should be stored using the same units. preferred-vocabulary: Contact the HealthVault team to help define this vocabulary. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Thing::Types::Codablevalue

[Source]
